sections.name: Table: Arm Armor Pieces

sections.body: With the smallest area to protect, arm armor pieces tend to have the lowest armor value of all the piecemeal armor types, with light armor pieces offering little to no protection unless they are part of a complete suit. Because arm armor pieces tend to interfere with hand movements needed for somatic components, they offer the highest spell failure chance.

This armor piece consists of pauldrons, gardbraces, rerebraces, vambraces, and gauntlets all cunningly designed to increase the maneuverability of the wearer. When worn alone, with an agile plate torso armor piece, or with an agile plate torso armor piece and a chain leg armor piece (or lighter armor), the armor check penalty for Climb skill and jump checks is only –4 (masterwork and mithral versions of this armor and the above armor piece combination reduce this penalty as well as the normal penalty).

sections.name: Agile Plate Arm Armor Piece

sections.body: These overlapping strips of metal on leather usually take the form of long sleeves connected to pauldrons of the same material at the top of the sleeves and a pair of metal gauntlets at the hands of the armor piece.
sections.url: pfsrd://Ultimate Combat/Rules/Variant Rules/Piecemeal Armor/Armor Piece Descriptions/Arms/Banded Arm Armor Piece
sections.name: Banded Arm Armor Piece

sections.body: This arm armor piece typically takes the form of sleeves of loose-fitting chain fitted to the shoulder, or separate lengths of chain attached to pauldrons and couters, and ending in a pair of gauntlets at the hands.
sections.url: pfsrd://Ultimate Combat/Rules/Variant Rules/Piecemeal Armor/Armor Piece Descriptions/Arms/Chain Arm Armor Piece
sections.name: Chain Arm Armor Piece

sections.body: This arm armor piece consists of sleeves crafted from the tanned and preserved skin of a thick-skinned beast.
sections.url: pfsrd://Ultimate Combat/Rules/Variant Rules/Piecemeal Armor/Armor Piece Descriptions/Arms/Hide Arm Armor Piece
sections.name: Hide Arm Armor Piece

sections.body: This arm armor piece is constructed of a number of horn plates laced together in parallel rows and reinforced with leather.
sections.url: pfsrd://Ultimate Combat/Rules/Variant Rules/Piecemeal Armor/Armor Piece Descriptions/Arms/Horn Lamellar Arm Armor Piece
sections.name: Horn Lamellar Arm Armor Piece

sections.body: This arm armor piece is constructed of a number of iron plates laced together in parallel rows and reinforced with pieces of chainmail.

sections.name: Iron Lamellar Arm Armor Piece

sections.body: This arm armor piece consists of sleeves of leather reinforced by hexagonal plates made from iron.
sections.url: pfsrd://Ultimate Combat/Rules/Variant Rules/Piecemeal Armor/Armor Piece Descriptions/Arms/Kikko Arm Armor Piece
sections.name: Kikko Arm Armor Piece

sections.body: This arm armor piece is constructed of light lamellar shoulder guards and lacquered sleeves.
sections.url: pfsrd://Ultimate Combat/Rules/Variant Rules/Piecemeal Armor/Armor Piece Descriptions/Arms/Kusari Gusoku Arm Armor Piece
sections.name: Kusari Gusoku Arm Armor Piece

sections.body: This arm armor piece consists of sleeves of hard-boiled leather that are carefully sewn together.
sections.url: pfsrd://Ultimate Combat/Rules/Variant Rules/Piecemeal Armor/Armor Piece Descriptions/Arms/Leather Arm Armor Piece
sections.name: Leather Arm Armor Piece

sections.body: Similar to a leather arm armor piece, a leather lamellar arm armor piece is constructed of a number of discrete hard-boiled leather plates laced together in parallel rows.
sections.url: pfsrd://Ultimate Combat/Rules/Variant Rules/Piecemeal Armor/Armor Piece Descriptions/Arms/Leather Lamellar Arm Armor Piece
sections.name: Leather Lamellar Arm Armor Piece

sections.body: These sleeves are made from many interlocking pieces of steel shaped to resemble a symbol for the word “mountain” and riveted onto cloth.
sections.url: pfsrd://Ultimate Combat/Rules/Variant Rules/Piecemeal Armor/Armor Piece Descriptions/Arms/Mountain Pattern Arm Armor Piece
sections.name: Mountain Pattern Arm Armor Piece

sections.body: This armor piece consists of steel lamellar shoulder guards, and sleeves made of metal reinforced with leather. O-yoroi arms end in gauntlets.
sections.url: pfsrd://Ultimate Combat/Rules/Variant Rules/Piecemeal Armor/Armor Piece Descriptions/Arms/O-Yoroi Arm Armor Piece
sections.name: O-Yoroi Arm Armor Piece

sections.body: These sleeves are made of heavy or quilted cloth.
sections.url: pfsrd://Ultimate Combat/Rules/Variant Rules/Piecemeal Armor/Armor Piece Descriptions/Arms/Padded Arm Armor Piece
sections.name: Padded Arm Armor Piece

sections.body: A plate lamellar is composed of pauldrons, gardbraces, rerebraces, vambraces, and gauntlets, along with bits of chainmail and padded armor.
sections.url: pfsrd://Ultimate Combat/Rules/Variant Rules/Piecemeal Armor/Armor Piece Descriptions/Arms/Plate Arm Armor Piece
sections.name: Plate Arm Armor Piece

sections.body: These sleeves are made of heavy quilted cloth specially designed to trap arrows and other ranged piercing weapons. When worn alone, or with only other quilted cloth pieces, you gain DR 3/— against ranged piercing weapons.
sections.url: pfsrd://Ultimate Combat/Rules/Variant Rules/Piecemeal Armor/Armor Piece Descriptions/Arms/Quilted Cloth Arm Armor Piece
sections.name: Quilted Cloth Arm Armor Piece

sections.body: These sleeves are made up of dozens of small overlapping metal plates. A scale arm armor piece includes a pair of gauntlets.
sections.url: pfsrd://Ultimate Combat/Rules/Variant Rules/Piecemeal Armor/Armor Piece Descriptions/Arms/Scale Arm Armor Piece
sections.name: Scale Arm Armor Piece

sections.body: These sleeves are constructed of metal strips reinforced with chain mail. A splint arm armor piece includes a pair of gauntlets.
sections.url: pfsrd://Ultimate Combat/Rules/Variant Rules/Piecemeal Armor/Armor Piece Descriptions/Arms/Splint Arm Armor Piece
sections.name: Splint Arm Armor Piece

sections.body: These sleeves are constructed of a number of steel plates laced together in parallel rows. A steel lamellar arm armor piece includes a pair of gauntlets.
sections.url: pfsrd://Ultimate Combat/Rules/Variant Rules/Piecemeal Armor/Armor Piece Descriptions/Arms/Steel Lamellar Arm Armor Piece
sections.name: Steel Lamellar Arm Armor Piece

sections.body: These sleeves are constructed of hard-boiled leather carefully sewn together and reinforced with metal studs.
sections.url: pfsrd://Ultimate Combat/Rules/Variant Rules/Piecemeal Armor/Armor Piece Descriptions/Arms/Studded Leather Arm Armor Piece
sections.name: Studded Leather Arm Armor Piece

sections.body: A lighter version of o-yoroi armor, a tatami-do arm armor piece is composed of a lighter lamellar shoulder guard and a lacquered sleeve. A set of tatami-do arm armor pieces includes a pair of gauntlets.
